column2: ...My name is Feena. It feels like\nI've been locked up down here for\nmy entire life...
column3: 我的名字叫...菲娜。\n从很久以前开始，一直被关在这地方。

column2: I remember, it was a man in a\nblack cape who put me here...
column3: 把我囚禁在这里的人，\n是穿着黑色斗蓬的男人...

column2: He is a terrible man, who seems to\ncontrol the very movements of the\nmonsters.
column3: 他操纵魔物像控制自己的手脚一样，好可怕啊。

column2: It's dangerous here. You should\nforget about me... Please, hurry,\nget away from here, while you can!
column3: 留在这里你也会有危险。\n不要担心我...你快点走吧。

column2: <!empty>
Take her with you
column3: 带她离开

column2: Come back later
column3: 稍后再来解救

column2: <!empty>
You're... You're going to help me?
column3: 你是说...你要救我出去？

column2: <!empty>
...You're saying...I can leave\nthis place?
column3: 不敢相信...\n我竟然能离开这里...

column2: Adol...
column3: 亚特鲁...先生。

column2: Thank you so very much...
column3: 谢谢你...

column2: <!empty>
Adol swore to Feena that he would\nlead her to a safe place.
column3: 决定了，护送被囚禁的\n少女菲娜到\n安全的地方去吧。

column2: <!empty>
You needn't worry about me.\nI am incidental.
column3: 请你不要在意...\n我的事情。

column2: You said you were searching for\nsomething, no?
column3: 重要的是你正在做的事。\n你不是说你在寻找什么吗？

column2: I am...oddly familiar with this\nshrine, and I believe its lower\nlevels are riddled with secrets.
column3: 神殿的地下好像设有\n很多机关的样子。

column2: Secrets invisible to the naked eye.\nAnd you must know how to discern\nthem, if you are to proceed.
column3: 有些地方是要看\n破解机关之后才能进入的...

column2: Please, take this with you.
column3: 这个请你拿去吧。

column2: <!empty>
<!empty>
<!empty>
The man in the black cape put\nthat mask in here with me.
column3: 面具是穿着黑色斗蓬的人\n收纳在这个房间的...

column2: <!empty>
I believe it will be of some use\nto you.
column3: 我想这个你一定会需要用到的。

column2: <!empty>
Adol Christin. Leave this place,\nas quickly as you can!
column3: 亚特鲁先生...\n请赶快离开这里。

column2: If the monsters should catch you\nhere, I'm loathe to think of what\nmay happen to you...
column3: 被巡逻的魔物发现就糟了。

column2: <!empty>
Adol. Please, take care.
column3: 亚特鲁先生，希望你平安无事...

column2: Adol, are you okay?
column3: 亚特鲁先生，你平安无事吗？

column2: I'm glad to see you.
column3: 太好了...

column2: Did you find what you were\nsearching for?
column3: 你找到你在寻找的东西了是吧。

column2: ...What? You're going to...get\nme out of here...?
column3: ...咦？你说要带我出去？

column2: Adol couldn't help but\nthink of the girl trapped\nin the dungeon cell.
column3: 不行，心里老是挂念着\n被囚禁的那个少女。

column2: He knew he had to\ngo back for her.
column3: 不行，不能放着她不管。

column2: Feena seems to have gotten\nherself lost somewhere. She\nis no longer following Adol.
column3: 菲娜没有跟过来。\n 她好像走失了。

column2: Adol cannot leave\nFeena behind.
column3: 我不能只顾自己回去，\n丢下她不管。

column2: This item doesn't have the\npower to transport two people.
column3: 看来这个道具的力量\n并不足以\n一次传送两个人回去。

column2: Adol cannot leave\nFeena behind.
column3: 我不能丢下她，\n一个人回去。

column2: This stairway leads\nto the lower levels\nof the shrine.
column3: 有个通往地下的楼梯。

column2: Adol would never place Feena\nin danger by leading her to\nsuch a place.
column3: 我不能再带着她\n到危险的地方去冒险。

column2: This stairway leads\nto the lower levels\nof the shrine.
column3: 有个通往地下的楼梯。

column2: Adol cannot leave\nFeena behind.
column3: 我不能丢下她离开。

column2: Adol found a hidden\nroom behind the wall.
column3: 发现墙壁内的密室。

column2: The man in the black cape put\nthat mask in here with me.
column3: 面具是穿着黑色斗蓬的人\n收纳在这个房间的...

column2: Perhaps it could be of some use\nto you.
column3: 我想这个你一定会需要用到。

column2: <!empty>
It's a dead end...
column3: 好像走进死路了...

column2: <!empty>
Um... Adol... It's a bit, uh, tight\nback here, don't you think?
column3: 啊...亚特鲁先生...\n这里太窄了...

column2: <!empty>
It's a dead end...
column3: 好像走进死路了...

column2: <!empty>
Um... Adol? You're kind of scaring me\nright now...
column3: 呃...亚特鲁先生...\n那个面具...有点令人害怕。

column2: Feena seems to have gotten\nherself lost somewhere. She\nis no longer following Adol.
column3: 她没有跟上来。\n好像走失了。

column2: Feena is watching Adol from\nthe next room, scared. She\nis no longer following him.
column3: 她没有跟上来。\n停在之前的房间，不安地看着这边。

column2: I'm...afraid to go any\nfarther in...
column3: 前面好可怕...我不敢过去...。

column2: <!empty>
<!empty>
This really is no place\nfor you to be bringing\na young girl!
column3: 你怎么可以带一位小姐到这种地方啊。

column2: Either way, is she all\nright? She doesn't look\nparticularly well...
column3: 没问题吧？\n那位小姐的脸色很差的样子哦...

column2: My grandmother Jeba lives in\nthe village at the bottom of\nthe mountain.
column3: 我的奶奶洁瓦就住在山麓的村庄里。

column2: <!empty>
<!empty>
Oh, you know her already? Well,\nthen what are you doing here?!
column3: ...什么，你说你知道她？\n这样事情就好办了。\n去跟她说明情况，给那女孩休息吧。

column2: Get that girl to my grandmother's\nhouse in Zepik Village, before she\nhas a heart attack or something!
column3: 你还慢吞吞的做什么。\n快把人带过去啊！不要有什么三长两短了！

column2: <!empty>
Oh, my, welcome to our\noh-so-humble abode.
column3: 哦，欢迎光临我们这个破地方。

column2: But miss, have\nyou not heard?
column3: 我说这位小姐呀。\n你没有听说过吗？

column2: This is a place of ill\nrepute. A den of thieves.
column3: 这里可是恶盟昭彰的盗贼碉堡哦。

column2: <!empty>

Pretty thoughtless to bring
a girl like you to a place
like this. Wanna ditch the
zero, and go grab a drink?
column3: 别管那个把你带入险境的薄情的小兄弟，\n来跟我喝杯茶聊聊天，\n怎么样呀？

column2: <!empty>
Leave your money and your\ngirl, and get out. Now!
column3: 把钱跟女人留下，滚蛋！

column2: ...I'm not serious, but what\nif I were? Not like you could\ndo anything about it!
column3: 要是遇到这样的事怎么办呀？\n你也太没有防备了。

column2: <!empty>
Lucky for you, we only\nantagonize the filthy\nrich. Emphasis on filthy.
column3: 放心啦。\n我们只挑黑心的有钱人下手。

column2: I...I'm all right...Adol...
column3: 我没事的...亚特鲁先生。

column2: I'm just tired, that's all...
column3: 我只是有点累了而已...\n

column2: Don't...worry...about me...
column3: 请你...不要在意...

column2: Feena lapsed into unconsciousness.\nAdol felt her forehead, and confirmed\nthat she had a fever.
column3: 菲娜\n闭上眼睛失去了意识。\n摸她的额头，非常的烫。

column2: Luckily, Jeba's house\nwas very close.
column3: 幸好洁瓦的家就在附近。

column2: Adol gently lifted Feena over\nhis shoulder, and promptly\ncarried her to Jeba's.
column3: 亚特鲁背起菲娜，\n奔向洁瓦家。

column2: ...She's sleeping well.
column3: ...睡得很熟的样子。

column2: The medicine should help. Add a\ngood night's rest, and she should\nbe fine by morning.
column3: 药力开始生效了，\n睡了一晚之后应该会恢复元气吧。

column2: Still... No matter how you look at\nit, it's a very strange story.
column3: 不过...这件事越听越觉得不可思议呀。

column2: <!empty>
The sacred inner sanctum, sealed\nunder the shrine for so long,\nbecoming home to monsters...
column3: 长期以来一直被封印的地下圣域，\n竟然不知不觉中成为魔物的巢穴...

column2: And a girl imprisoned there,\nno less! So much of this simply\ndoesn't add up...
column3: 而那个女孩，\n又一直被囚禁在圣域里面...\n嗯...让人搞不明白的事情还真多呀。

column2: <!empty>
<!empty>
The medicine seemed to have kicked\nin. Feena's breathing was steady,\nand her fever had subsided.
column3: 不知是不是药力的作用，\n菲娜睡得很沉，\n呼吸也平稳多了...

column2: Don't you worry, I'll take good\ncare of her.
column3: 我会为你照顾那孩子的。

column2: She'll be up and about soon\nenough, good as new!
column3: 不用担心了。\n再过不久她自然会清醒过来。

column2: <!empty>
<!empty>
